item.title: Soul of the Fire (Sword of Truth series, Book 5) by Terry Goodkind
item.description: This book is perhaps a let-down from the enthralling Temple of the Winds. The surprising discoveries, the heart-pounding action of the previous volumes are missing here, even during the climax, and the main danger seems somehow diminished and unimportant. The storyline doesn’t concern much with magic; in fact the absence of it is the crux of the story. What we’ve got left has mostly to do with the world of ordinary, non-magic people (muggles?
